objects.text:
• Mechanical precision, no batteries
• Premium metal construction
• Complete creative control

Perfect for both collectors and
photography enthusiasts

Rediscover photography's roots
with true craftsmanship

product_details.name: Classic Vintage SLR Camera - Professional Photography Made Timeless
product_details.description:
• Beautifully preserved vintage SLR camera with mechanical precision
• Premium silver and black metal construction built to last
• Standard 50mm prime lens with crisp, clear optics
• Genuine leather camera strap for comfortable carrying
• Manual focus system for complete creative control
• Fully mechanical operation - no batteries required
• Classic light meter for accurate exposure readings
• Hot shoe mount for external flash compatibility
• Perfect for both collectors and photography enthusiasts
• Ideal for learning traditional photography techniques
• Includes original metal body case and protective lens cap
• Compatible with wide range of vintage lenses

banner_details:
This banner features a modern vintage design with a dual-tone background split vertically into deep charcoal gray on the left and a slightly lighter shade on the right. The left section prominently presents the product with a bold typographic hierarchy, starting with a large, white uppercased heading (`heading`), followed by a sleek golden tagline (`tagline`) to set a refined, nostalgic tone. Below, there is a clean list of features (`description`) in soft white, a supporting subheading (`subheading`), and a strong call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) in golden yellow. A second tagline (`tagline_2`) reinforces the message in the footer. On the right, an image of a person holding a vintage camera (`product_image`) captures the essence of analog photography, overlaid with aesthetic circular graphics that create a sense of focus and depth. Additional abstract shapes and soft dot patterns enhance the retro-modern aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Gray: #2C2C2C
- Dark Gray: #3A3A3A
- Golden Yellow: #B8860B
- Off White: #E0E0E0
- Light Gray Circle Accents: #CCCCCC
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a woman holding a classic film camera, combining a vintage aesthetic with soft, natural tones. The primary colors present are muted mauve (#B98E94) from her shirt, warm natural skin tones (#D8A17B), deep brown hair (#4F3629), and the metallic-silver camera body (#AAB1B7). The lens glass features subtle accents of purple-pink (#A67794), adding a modern pop. These colors blend harmoniously: the soft mauve and brown evoke warmth and nostalgia, while the silver and black camera (#1C1C1C) contrasts sharply to draw attention. For an ad banner, use this balanced palette to highlight elegance, retro charm, and creative expression.
